author: bandaram
msg: DERBY-464: This batch of Grant & Revoke changes include:
1) Prevent GRANT statements on Synonyms, VTIs and Views (for now...pending more changes).
2) Change interface to StatementPermission objects... Dan suggested changing interface to include LCC.
This is an empty revision for padding.

author: danielf
msg: Made the http service "whiteboard" Activator independent of when it is started, before it was necessary to start it before the blocks. Now it can also be stopped and started dynamically, without crashing the rest of the system. It generates some exceptions that I haven't fixed, while doing this.

msg: * Mailreader - Try some different tag prefixes on for size.
